title: Indulge
description: I’m a glutton. I indulge in women because I can.Carrick knows love is merely a shattered memory.  Until Peyton stumbles into his arms and he steals a kiss.  One taste isn’t enough. One touch would never satiate him.And he does what he’s become accustomed to, he indulges in her.A man hell bent on not falling in love, he pushes.But Peyton’s not giving up. Can they have forever while Carrick is haunted by a ghost from his past?*This is an erotic romance with BDSM elements. Due to scenes of an adult nature, this book is for 18+ ONLY.
author: Dani René
